title: Islam in America: An Conversation with Amir Hussain
description:
Listen in as Raj Balkaran speaks with Amir Hussain (Chair, Theological Studies at Layola Marymount University) about his scholarship on Muslims in America, his work as the Editor of the Journal of the American Academy of Religion (2011-2015), his role as the Vice President of the American Academy of Religion, and overall trends in the field of Religious Studies.
Raj Balkaran is a scholar, educator, consultant, and life coach. For information see rajbalkaran.com.
